facts.longInfo: As a UX Engineer, I'm proficient in both design and development. I specialize in user-centric, as well as visual and product design. On the engineering side, I focus on writing clean, efficient, and scalable SCSS, semantic HTML, and front-end Javascript, including libraries like ReactJS.
Sketch and Figma are my two tools of choice when it comes to UI Design. As for web development, I tend to favor GatsbyJS for its ability to build static webpages while utilizing React.
In my spare time, I'm passionate about writing, singing, and chess.
I graduated with a Bachelor of Arts in Media Studies at SUNY University at Buffalo in 2013.
